Detailed Description

Adaptive updaters for mixtures of Gaussians (i.e.

Grimson and similar)

Author:
Matt Leotta (mleotta@lems.brown.edu)
Date:
July 13, 2005

This file contains updaters based on "Adaptive background mixture models for real-time tracking" Grimson et. al.

    Modifications
     (none yet)
